item.description: Expected features There are a lot of things to consider while building an app. Besides the main feature of your app, you’ll have to consider the following expected features: User Feedback Monitoring License Screen Imprint Privacy Policy Show version number in “about app” screen

File size Why? Smaller apps are cheaper and faster to download. It does not take us much space on the user smartphone. Android Use app bundles Optimize file size, see https://developer.android.com/docs/quality-guidelines/build-for-billions/data-cost Remove debug symbols use R8 use resolution aware images use vector images iOS Strip debug symbols use resolution aware images use vector images bit code

Release Process Use staged rollouts Use feature toggles Use test channels to beta test the app Have the ability to force user to update. This must be added before the first app went live because you can’t add this after your app went live.
